Title: Pissters!
Writer: Jenji Kohan (created by), Rebecca Angelo, Lauren Schuker Blum, Molly Smith Metzler (executive story editor), Rebecca Angelo (staff writer), Lauren Schuker Blum (staff writer), Josh Koenigsberg (staff writer), Anthony Natoli (staff writer)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Natasha Lyonne, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks
Plot: Linda begins to see the prison in a new light, while Judy grows desperate to escape. With darkness falling, the inmates compile a list of demands.
